name: Tales of the World: Dice Adventure
summary: Tales of the World: Dice Adventure is a web browser-based board game in the Tales series released April 26, 2012 in Japan. The game is a role-playing and board game hybrid, where the player rolls virtual dice to determine how much a character moves across the board. Through the course of traversing the board, the player can form parties with other characters, experience story events, and participate in battles.
